titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: International Commission on Radiation Units and Measurements - Description

div.p: The International Commission on Radiation Units and Measurements is an ORGANISATION.
The International Commission on Radiation Units and Measurements (ICRU) establishes international standards for radiation units and measurement.
For further information on the International Commission on Radiation Units and Measurements, see the International Commission on Radiation Units and Measurements website.
